==Web Scripts Installation==
  # In Alfreso Explorer (Web Client) use the Import action and import integratedsemantics.zip into /Company Home/Data Dictionary/Web Scripts Extensions/
folder inside it will be unzipped automatically
  # restart Alfresco server or use the "Refresh Web Scripts" button on http://localhost:8080/alfresco/service/ on the web script home page
  # verify install of webscripts on the web script home page by "Browse by Web Script Package" and you should see bunch of /integratedsemantics packages

==FlexibleShare "In Browser" Installation==
  # web script installation required first
  # copy "flexible-share" folder to <alfresco install dir>/tomcat/webapps
  # configure domain (hostname or ip address) and port in FlexSpacesConfig.xml
  # run  http://localhost:8080/flexible-share/FlexibleShare.html

==FlexibleShare AIR Installation==
  # web script installation required first
  # Run FlexibleShareAir.air to install but don't launch right after install
  # configure domain (hostname or ip address) and port in FlexSpacesConfig.xml
on 32 bit Windows FlexSpacesConfig.xml is in c:\Program Files\FlexibleShareAIR\FlexSpacesConfig.xml on 64 bit Windows FlexSpacesConfig.xml is in C:\Program Files (x86)\FlexibleShareAir on Mac: In finder choose "Show Package Contents" on installed FlexibleShareAir.app, FlexSpacesConfig.xml is in contents/resources/
